Note.Q: A third of mankind was killed by the three plagues of fire, smoke and sulfur that came out of their mouths.
But after the three and a half days the breath of life from God entered them, and they stood on their feet, and terror struck those who saw them.
Note.P: The dragon in heaven is a symbol of the DEVIL.

LI.P: ACCUSATION, destroyed through the CROSS of Jesus.
DECEPTION, diminished through the WORD of God.
INTIMIDATION, defended through the SEAL of the Spirit.

Note.P: The beast from the sea is a symbol of GODLESS GOVERNMENT.
The beast from the land is a symbol of FALSE RELIGION.
